rows.description: User has granted permission to receive notifications
Running on a web platform that does not support notification api (e.g. chrome for android)
User has not yet been prompted to allow permission. Can prompt
User has been prompted but dismissed prompt without fully denying, e.g. via "do not ask again". Can re-prompt
Status check has not been completed before template loaded. This may happen if using field on initial landing screen such as home page
